testschema.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #include "testschema.h"
00002 #include "test_data_gen.h"
00003 #include "pmsg.h"
00004 
00005 #define NUM_RECORDS 1000
00006 
00007 /* The records generated in test_rec_write().
00008    Will be used in test_rec_read() to check for correctness. */
00009 record in_recs[NUM_RECORDS];
00010 
00011 
00012 void test_rec_write ( const char *sch_name )
00013 {       
00014   put_msg (INFO, "test_rec_write (\"%s\") ...\n", sch_name);
00015 
00016   open_db ();
00017   /* put_pager_info (DEBUG, "After open_db"); */
00018 
00019   schema_p sch = get_schema ( sch_name );
00020   /* Force a fresh start. Clean what is left from a previous run. */
00021   if (sch != NULL) remove_schema ( sch );
00022   sch = create_test_schema ( sch_name );
00023                         
00024   reset_test_data_gen ();
00025 
00026   int rnr;
00027   for (rnr = 0; rnr < NUM_RECORDS; rnr++)
00028   {
00029     /* put_msg (DEBUG, "rnr %d  ", rnr); */
00030     /* fill the record with new generated data */
00031     in_recs[rnr] = new_record ( sch );
00032     fill_gen_record (sch, in_recs[rnr]);
00033     append_record (in_recs[rnr], sch);
00034     /* put_pager_info (DEBUG, "After writing a record"); */
00035   }
00036 
00037   /* put_pager_info (DEBUG, "Before page_terminate"); */
00038   put_db_info (DEBUG);
00039   close_db ();
00040   /* put_pager_info (DEBUG, "After close_db"); */
00041         
00042   put_pager_profiler_info (INFO);
00043   put_msg (INFO,  "test_rec_write() done.\n\n");
00044 }
00045 
00046 void test_rec_read ( const char *sch_name )
00047 {
00048   put_msg (INFO,  "test_rec_read (\"%s\") ...\n", sch_name);
00049         
00050   open_db ();
00051   /* put_pager_info (DEBUG, "After open_db"); */
00052         
00053   schema_p sch = get_schema ( sch_name );
00054   record out_rec = new_record ( sch );
00055   set_tbl_position ( get_table (sch_name), TBL_BEG );
00056   int rnr;
00057 
00058   for (rnr = 0; rnr < NUM_RECORDS; rnr++)
00059     {
00060       get_record (out_rec, sch);
00061       if ( !equal_record( out_rec, in_recs[rnr], sch) )
00062         {
00063           put_msg (FATAL, "test_rec_read:\n");
00064           put_record_info (FATAL, out_rec, sch);
00065           put_msg (FATAL, "should be:\n");
00066           put_record_info (FATAL, in_recs[rnr], sch);
00067           exit (EXIT_FAILURE);
00068         }
00069       release_record (in_recs[rnr], sch);
00070       /* put_pager_info (DEBUG, "After reading a record"); */
00071     }
00072 
00073   release_record (out_rec, sch);
00074 
00075   /* put_pager_info (DEBUG, "Before page_terminate"); */
00076   put_pager_profiler_info (INFO);
00077   close_db ();
00078   /* put_pager_info (DEBUG, "After close_db"); */
00079         
00080   put_msg (INFO,  "test_rec_read() succeeds.\n");
00081         
00082 }
